articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Africa CDC urges Western countries to boost funding for mpox response - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Health agency reports 107 deaths and 3,160 new cases over the last week, says toll ‘not acceptable’.
articles.content:
The head of the African Unions health agency has called on Western countries to learn from the COVID-19 pandemic and not abandon Africa amid an ongoing mpox outbreak.
Dr Jean Kaseya, director-genera… [+3179 chars]
